name: Data Insights Projects Pages
body:
### Welcome to My Projects Pages.
I have loaded a couple of demo projects here so they can be viewed in one place to discuss

### Data Science
I have tried to have some fun and create projects that incorporate data science with a lean towards machine learning.

### Each project tries to show use of a different data science or machine learning tool
The project tools include the use of:
* **IBM Watson to interpret natural language**-This project uses an advertised job posting description data to generate a virtual person based upon the job description attributes from Data input taken directly from Job #302023856 University of Southern California Los Angeles, CA Job description for Sr. Data Analyst http://www.beyond.com/jobs/search?id=302023856&aff=39D7A8D9-A438-4E09-972C-EA4AA99FA062&reg=3

[Link to IBM Natural Language Project Full Description](https://github.com/acourtney2015/dataInsightsRepo/blob/master/IBM%20Natural%20Language%20Personality%20project.docx)


[Link to Needs Values and Attributes Chart Generated](https://github.com/acourtney2015/dataInsightsRepo/blob/master/IBM%20Watson%205%20needs%20chart%20generated.png)
* **Amazon Web Services** -This project analyzes a 4.7MB banking data set to determine customer churn (subscription propensity).This project uses a simple binary Classification 70/30 train test split model. 

[Link to Full Machine Learning Stats](https://eml-prod-emr.s3.amazonaws.com/982519870170-pr-ml-V1aW87bemDl/userlog/982519870170-pr-ml-V1aW87bemDl?AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAJ76NNIATX32EN2VA&Expires=1460223951&Signature=RvSCxmNO5E43n9qBI8gMQxUOMg4%3D)

[Link to brief Machine Learning Stats on Github](https://github.com/acourtney2015/dataInsightsRepo/blob/master/Amazon%20Machine%20Learning%20Banking%20Data.docx)

[Link to Subscription Propensity Model for Marketing purposes Generated](https://github.com/acourtney2015/dataInsightsRepo/blob/master/Marketing%20attributes.png)

[Link to full statistics on the trained model](https://github.com/acourtney2015/dataInsightsRepo/blob/master/amazon%20full%20statistics%20on%20the%20model%20trained.png)
* Google Compute Engine to create a two-tier application. The front-end VM runs a Node.js todo web app, and the back-end VM runs MongoDB 
![](http://www.nextgearcapital.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Big-Data.jpg)



### Authors and Contributors
